mapper.insert: insert into jobs (job_id, job_title, min_salary, max_salary) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{minSalary}, #{maxSalary})
mapper.select: select job_id as id, job_title as title, min_salary as minSalary, max_salary as maxSalary from jobs order by job_id asc
select job_id as id, job_title as title, min_salary as minSalary, max_salary as maxSalary from jobs WHERE job_id = #{id}
